title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 562.6 - Motorcycles and mopeds
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 562.6 - Motorcycles and mopeds

State Regulations

Parking for motorcycles and mopeds is prohibited anywhere
on campus except the designated motorcycle parking areas located in lots D and
S-1 and in lots A and A-1. Motorcycles and mopeds parking anywhere else will be
tagged. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
562.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
